# right

**Type Property**

The touch moves from left to right. This direction is the default.

## Declaration

```swift
static var right: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection { get }
```

## Constants

- **left**: The touch moves from right to left.
- **up**: The touch moves upward.
- **down**: The touch moves downward.

items.description: The touch moves from right to left.
items.name: left
